name: Bob_(Great_Northern)
text:
Bob (Great Northern)
"Okay, Bob. Okay, Bob."
 ―Audrey Horne
Bob was an employee at the Great Northern Hotel in February 1989.
While a group of Norwegian businessmen prepared to sign a development deal with hotel owner Benjamin Horne, Bob told co-worker Julie Duvic to make sure that they did not hear about the murder of Laura Palmer that morning before they signed.
